item.title: NGINX Plus and JWT
item.description:
Overview

NGINX Gateway Fabric with NGINX Plus requires a valid JSON Web Token (JWT) to download the container image from the F5 registry. From version 1.5.0, this JWT token is also required to run NGINX Plus.

This requirement is part of F5â€™s broader licensing program and aligns with industry best practices. The JWT will streamline subscription renewals and usage reporting, helping you manage your NGINX Plus subscription more efficiently. The telemetry data we collect helps us improve our products and services to better meet your needs.

item.title: Build NGINX Gateway Fabric
item.description:
Overview

While most users will install NGINX Gateway Fabric with Helm or Kubernetes manifests, manually building the NGINX Gateway Fabric and NGINX images can be helpful for testing and development purposes. Follow the steps in this document to build the NGINX Gateway Fabric and NGINX images.

Before you begin

Before you can build the NGINX Gateway Fabric and NGINX images, make sure you have the following software installed on your machine:
